body:
> @daimingzhi I was trying to send the slack invitation to your [dmzitman@163.com](mailto:dmzitman@163.com), but fails. Don't know why.

Maybe you can try it out with this address dmzitman@gmail.com

I may not have time these days because I need to prepare a PPT for my promotion. I will continue in September.

> > @daimingzhi I was trying to send the slack invitation to your [dmzitman@163.com](mailto:dmzitman@163.com), but fails. Don't know why.
> 
> Maybe you can try it out with this address [dmzitman@gmail.com](mailto:dmzitman@gmail.com)
> 
> I may not have time these days because I need to prepare a PPT for my promotion. I will continue in September.

Sure, thanks for the update.
Let's see how much time `-q` could help

> Let's see how much time `-q` could help

I don't expect `-q` to save time, but want to get rid of the verbose logs when finding problems.
